title: What BTS songs sound kind of the same at the beginning? - Quora

response.answer_text: Save Me and I’m Fine are songs that sound the similar at the beginning, but that’s because they are basically the same. Save Me, off of The Most Beautiful Moment in Life, Young Forever album, is a cry out for help, with more somber lyrics such as “Why is it so dark where you’re not here / It’s dangerous how wrecked I am / Save me because I can’t get a grip on myself”. I’m Fine, off of BTS’s most recent release Love Yourself: Answer, puts a literal twist on this theme, and the producer/rap line even decided to use samples from Save Me’s actual intro in I’m Fine’s intro. Throughout the song, the lyrics show direct contrast to Save Me’s, such as “Give me your hand / save me, save me” in Save Me, and “I’ll let go of your hand now” in I’m Fine. I’m Fine displays the triumph that BTS has won over their own personal struggles, in which they felt as if they needed someone else to Save Them from.

Save Me and I’m Fine These two have the same intro, but opposite meanings. Save Me is about needing someone's hand to lead you from the darkness, and I'm Fine is a sequel where that person’s hand is no longer needed - for the one who needed saving has realised that the truth is there in front of them and they can now make their own path.
